hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"A man of the Ansar came to the Messenger of Allah and said: 'I have married a woman.' He said: 'Did you look at her? For there is something in the eyes of the Ansar

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا اسْتَشَارَ رَجُلٌ رَجُلاً فِي الْمَرْأَةِ هَلْ يُخْبِرُهُ بِمَا يَعْلَمُ .
chapter.eng-name: If A Man Consults Another Man About A Woman, Should He Tell Him What He Knows?
